participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and understanding, she tries to see things from different perspectives.
participant_1.background: Emily is a single mother balancing work and family life, often sharing her experiences with others.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Practical and straightforward, he values honesty and open communication.
participant_2.background: Michael is a dedicated father who works part-time, striving to provide for his children while being present in their lives.

content.text: Why? Because I got the kids three days a week and if I had a fulltime job...
